{{dcl|since=libfund_ts|
template&lt; class T &gt;
void swap( optional&lt;T&gt;&amp; lhs, optional&lt;T&gt;&amp; rhs ) noexcept(/* see below */);
}}
{{dcl end}}

Overloads the {{lc|std::swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::experimental::optional}}. Exchanges the state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Effectively calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|{{tt|optional}} objects whose states to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

=== Exceptions ===
{{noexcept|noexcept(lhs.swap(rhs))}}
